description.zh-cn: 一个促进全球警务合作与犯罪控制的国际组织，是目前世界上规模最大的执法合作平台。该组织成立于1923年，总部设在法国里昂。其本身不具备执法权，主要角色是协调与支持成员国执法机构。
description.en: An international organization that facilitates worldwide police cooperation and crime control, and is the world's largest platform for law enforcement cooperation. Founded in 1923, its headquarters are in Lyon, France. It does not have law enforcement powers itself; its main role is to coordinate and support member law enforcement agencies.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利警察局长和政治家，曾三度担任奥地利总理。他是国际刑事警察委员会（国际刑警组织前身）的主要发起人，并担任其首任主席。
description.en: An Austrian police administrator and politician who served as Chancellor of Austria three times. He was the primary initiator of the International Criminal Police Commission (predecessor to Interpol) and served as its first president.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年期间由阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治的德国。在1938年德奥合并后，纳粹德国控制了国际刑警组织。
description.en: The German state between 1933 and 1945, when Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party controlled the country. After the Anschluss in 1938, Nazi Germany took control of Interpol.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的军事冲突。在此期间，由纳粹德国控制的国际刑警组织运作几近瘫痪，直到战后才恢复正常。
description.en: A global military conflict. During this period, Interpol, under the control of Nazi Germany, became nearly defunct and only resumed normal operations after the war.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国的高级官员，党卫军上级集团领袖及警察上将。他在1940年至1942年间担任国际刑警组织主席。
description.en: A high-ranking German Nazi official, SS-Obergruppenführer and General of Police. He served as the President of Interpol from 1940 to 1942.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国党卫军的高级官员，在1942年至1943年间担任国际刑警组织主席。
description.en: A high-ranking official in the SS of Nazi Germany who served as the President of Interpol from 1942 to 1943.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国党卫军的高级官员，在1943年至1945年间担任国际刑警组织主席。他是纽伦堡审判后被处决的最高级别党卫军军官。
description.en: A high-ranking SS official in Nazi Germany who served as the President of Interpol from 1943 to 1945. He was the highest-ranking SS officer to be executed after the Nuremberg trials.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国的准军事组织。在纳粹德国控制国际刑警组织期间，其多位主席均为党卫军将军。
description.en: A major paramilitary organization under Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party in Nazi Germany. During the period of Nazi control over Interpol, several of its presidents were SS generals.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国公安部副部长。他于2016年当选为国际刑警组织主席，2018年在中国失踪后辞职并被捕。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as vice-minister of Public Security in China. He was elected President of Interpol in 2016 and resigned in 2018 after disappearing and being arrested in China.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，自1984年起成为国际刑警组织成员国。近年来被指控利用国际刑警组织追捕政治异议人士。
description.en: A country in East Asia, a member of Interpol since 1984. It has been accused in recent years of using Interpol to pursue political dissidents.

description.zh-cn: 南非前国家警察局长，于2004年至2008年担任国际刑警组织主席。他因腐败罪被南非高等法院定罪。
description.en: A former National Police Commissioner of South Africa who served as President of Interpol from 2004 to 2008. He was convicted of corruption by the South African High Court.

description.zh-cn: 南非的普通管辖权法院，其约翰内斯堡分院裁定前国际刑警组织主席杰基·塞莱比腐败罪名成立。
description.en: A court of general jurisdiction in South Africa. Its Johannesburg division convicted former Interpol President Jackie Selebi of corruption.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国曾是国际刑警组织成员，1984年中华人民共和国申请加入后，其席位被取代。
description.en: The Republic of China was a member of Interpol until its seat was replaced by the People's Republic of China in 1984.

description.zh-cn: 一份由联合国大会通过的历史性文件。国际刑警组织的章程规定其行动必须本着该宣言的精神。
description.en: A historic document adopted by the United Nations General Assembly. Interpol's constitution stipulates that its actions must be in the spirit of this declaration.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚国家，国际刑警组织成员国。被指控滥用国际刑警组织的通知系统来针对政治对手。
description.en: A transcontinental country in Eurasia and a member of Interpol. It has been accused of abusing Interpol's notice system to target political opponents.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰政治活动家、民族主义者。2014年，应俄罗斯当局的要求，他被列入国际刑警组织的国际通缉名单。
description.en: A Ukrainian political activist and nationalist. In 2014, he was placed on Interpol's international wanted list at the request of Russian authorities.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯联合酋长国内政部监察长，自2021年起担任国际刑警组织主席。他的当选因其国家的人权记录和针对他的酷刑指控而备受争议。
description.en: Inspector General of the UAE's Ministry of Interior, serving as President of Interpol since 2021. His election was controversial due to his country's human rights record and torture allegations against him.

description.zh-cn: 西亚国家，国际刑警组织成员国。被指控通过巨额捐款影响国际刑警组织，并使其官员艾哈迈德·纳赛尔·莱西当选主席。
description.en: A country in Western Asia and a member of Interpol. It has been accused of influencing Interpol through large financial donations and securing the presidency for its official, Ahmed Naser Al-Raisi.

description.zh-cn: 西亚国家，国际刑警组织成员国。被指控将国际刑警组织的机制武器化，以追捕合法的批评者和反对者。
description.en: A country in Western Asia and a member of Interpol. It has been accused of weaponizing Interpol's mechanisms to pursue legitimate critics and opponents.

description.zh-cn: 作为维也纳警察局局长，Johannes Schober发起了1923年的国际刑事警察大会，促成了国际刑事警察委员会（国际刑警组织的前身）的成立。
description.en: As the head of the Vienna police, Johannes Schober initiated the 1923 International Criminal Police Congress, which led to the founding of the International Criminal Police Commission, the predecessor to Interpol.

description.zh-cn: 1938年德奥合并后，国际刑警组织落入纳粹德国的控制之下，总部被迁至柏林，并由多名党卫军将军担任主席，导致大多数成员国退出。
description.en: After the 1938 Anschluss, Interpol fell under the control of Nazi Germany. Its headquarters were moved to Berlin, and several SS generals served as its president, causing most member states to withdraw.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次世界大战期间，国际刑警组织的运作几乎完全停滞，直到战争结束后才得以恢复。
description.en: During World War II, Interpol's operations became almost completely stagnant and were only restored after the war ended.

description.zh-cn: 孟宏伟在2016年当选为国际刑警组织主席，但在2018年因在中国被捕而辞职。
description.en: Meng Hongwei was elected President of Interpol in 2016, but resigned in 2018 following his arrest in China.

description.zh-cn: 时任国际刑警组织主席的孟宏伟在中国的一次行程中失踪，后被证实因涉嫌受贿而被中国当局逮捕。
description.en: Meng Hongwei, then President of Interpol, disappeared during a trip to China and was later confirmed to have been arrested by Chinese authorities on suspicion of bribery.

description.zh-cn: 南非高等法院裁定前国际刑警组织主席杰基·塞莱比因收受毒贩贿赂而犯有腐败罪。
description.en: The High Court of South Africa convicted former Interpol President Jackie Selebi of corruption for accepting bribes from a drug trafficker.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国于1984年申请并于1986年正式加入国际刑警组织。
description.en: The People's Republic of China applied in 1984 and officially joined Interpol in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的加入取代了中华民国在国际刑警组织的席位。
description.en: The entry of the People's Republic of China replaced the seat of the Republic of China in Interpol.

description.zh-cn: 国际刑警组织《章程》第2条规定，该组织必须本着《世界人权宣言》的精神，确保并促进各刑事警察当局之间最广泛的相互协助。
description.en: Article 2 of Interpol's Constitution stipulates that the organization must ensure and promote the widest possible mutual assistance between all criminal police authorities, in the spirit of the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.

description.zh-cn: 应俄罗斯当局的要求，国际刑警组织对乌克兰民族主义领导人德米特罗·亚罗什发布了国际通缉令。
description.en: At the request of Russian authorities, Interpol issued an international wanted notice for Ukrainian nationalist leader Dmytro Yarosh.

description.zh-cn: 被指控滥用国际刑警组织的红色通缉令等机制，以追捕居住在国外的维吾尔活动人士和其他政治异议人士。
description.en: Accused of abusing Interpol's mechanisms, such as Red Notices, to pursue Uyghur activists and other political dissidents living abroad.

description.zh-cn: 被指控通过提供巨额捐款来影响国际刑警组织，并成功使其内政部监察长艾哈迈德·纳赛尔·莱西当选为组织主席，引发了对其公正性的担忧。
description.en: Accused of influencing Interpol by providing large donations and successfully getting its Ministry of Interior Inspector General, Ahmed Naser Al-Raisi, elected as the organization's president, raising concerns about its impartiality.

description.zh-cn: 被指控将国际刑警组织的机制武器化，利用逮捕令和吊销护照等手段来骚扰和追捕合法的批评者、反对派人士和记者。
description.en: Accused of weaponizing Interpol's mechanisms, using arrest warrants and passport revocations to harass and pursue legitimate critics, opposition figures, and journalists.
